name: Karthus
title: the Deathsinger
shortBio: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of life and death. When Karthus emerges from the Shadow Isles, it is to bring the joy of death to mortals, an apostle of the unliving.

skins.name: Statue of Karthus
skins.description: At the entry point of one of the world's most powerful nations stands the three-hundred-and-five-foot-tall statue of an evil, undead preacher holding a giant torch. Sometimes it comes to life. It's fun. Statues are fun.

skins.name: Pentakill Karthus
skins.description: Lead singer of heavy-metal sensation PENTAKILL, Karthus sings in the voice of a fallen angel made of freshly polished chrome and dynamite that eats other dynamite. His vocals explode the sun in the sky, igniting the flame of metal within the hearts of all who hear.

skins.name: Fnatic Karthus
skins.description: Honoring xPeke's winning performance as Karthus during the 2011 World Championship.

skins.name: Karthus Lightsbane
skins.description: Dark sorcerer, master of forbidden magic, aspiring lichâ€”all could describe Karthus Lightsbane, a high level spellcaster with shadowy motivations. The rest of the party is convinced he'll eventually betray them, since nothing in the Riftquest rules says he can't.

skins.name: Infernal Karthus
skins.description: The disciples of Karthus usher this infernal harbinger into the world by singing his discordant chorus, a pledge that beckons pillars of flame unto them. On his arrival, the deathsinger's chant summons columns of hellfire that descend from the heavens above. Few live to tell of the dirge they heard before flames swept the land.

skins.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Karthus
skins.description: All hail, Karthus, the Voice of Doom, and Chosen of Perpetuum! His songs are bleak murder ballads, a bitter reminder that all things must die. Though, perhaps, not him?

skins.name: Elderwood Karthus
skins.description: Karthus was a brilliant scholar once upon a time. But when a disease nearly eradicated his people, he researched forbidden Coven magic, hoping to resurrect his loved ones... with catastrophic consequences. Now, he roams the Elderwood as a decaying creature, spreading his plague throughout the forest and inviting its inhabitants to transcend through death.

skins.name: Arcana Karthus
skins.description: The Pattern is a perfect chorus, a divine harmony, one which Karthus conducts like a choir. His tenor rises alongside it, singing minor-key dirges and rousing paeans, somber elegies and soaring anthems. Death becomes life becomes death once more, and Karthus remains, ever-singing the pattern that weaves through all things.

passive.name: Death Defied
passive.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

spells.name: Lay Waste
spells.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Karthus creates a blast of magic, dealing <magicDamage>@QDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. If the blast hits only one enemy, it instead deals <magicDamage>@QSingleTargetDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Wall of Pain
spells.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.dynamicDescription: Karthus creates a wall that lasts for @Effect4Amount@ seconds. Enemies that pass through lose <scaleMR>@Effect1Amount@% Magic Resist</scaleMR> for @Effect5Amount@ seconds and are <status>Slowed</status> by @Effect3Amount@% decaying over the duration.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Defile
spells.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores @Effect2Amount@ Mana.

Toggle: Karthus creates a necrotic aura, dealing @TotalDPS@ magic damage per second to nearby enemies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Requiem
spells.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spells.dynamicDescription: Karthus channels for 3 seconds, then deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> to enemy champions, regardless of distance.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
